overview: Five people who have failed in life attempt suicide, but they fail for a variety of reasons. One day, they receive a business card and text message from Well Dying Company. "Is it hard to live? We help you to die happily". The five people who headed to Ulsan visit tourist attractions for three days and two nights, experience a well-dying project that allows them to die happily at a place designated by them, and see a new world.
title: Well Dying Company
